name: Temple of Rust
description: 2d top-down trashpunk hack'n slay generator with a sling. Explore procedural seeded wasteland action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0c Compatible Card 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
